question: Which country's art got enriched by the works of "Niko Pirosmani"?
explanation: Georgia's art got enriched by the works of "Niko Pirosmani". Niko Pirosmani (1862â€“1918), was a Georgian naive painter who posthumously rose to prominence. Relatively poor for most of his life, he worked a variety of ordinary jobs. His rustic, everyday scenes are celebrated today for their depiction of the Georgia of Pirosmani's lifetime, and he has become one of the country's most beloved artistic figures.
